title: Lena Horne’s Upper East Side Co-op Is Listed at $2.195 Million
description: Ms. Horne, who died in 2010, lived in two combined apartments at the Volney on East 74th Street that she considered her private refuge.
dc:creator: Vivian Marino
media:credit: Al Siedman/VHT for The Corcoran Group
media:description: Lena Horne’s apartment at the Volney, with around 2,100 square feet of space, has an expansive living room perfect for entertaining.
